1131.content:
Homer was laid out on the couch, watching the television, he wasn't watching anything in particular; he was flicking through the channels, trying to find a programme that might take his interest. His eyes were glued to the set so he didn't see which buttons he was pressing. He wasn't even aware when he pressed a button on the remote that he hadn't touched before.

Suddenly there was a spark from the back of the control and he felt a tingling sensation seemed to pass through his body. The shock caused him to drop the remote, which fell to the floor. All of a sudden the room, and the couch appeared to be growing, or rather Homer started to shrink. In the space of about half a minute he has shrunk to no more than a foot in length.

Suddenly he heard footsteps approaching as someone else came in to the room, but who?
1131.title: Is found by a family member

11311.content:
Marge came into the room and was surprised to see that her husband Homer had shrunk to only a foot tall.
"Homie, you've shrunk!!" she shouted.
This caught Lisa and Bart's attention and they ran into the room.
"Wow, Dad's shrunk! Now I can take him to school for show-and-tell on Monday!" said Bart.
"Don't you dare!", said Marge.
"How did this happen?" asked Lisa.

What happens now?
11311.title: Marge

11312.content:
In walked Lisa, who had noticed that her dad had shrunk and was now only about a quarter of her height.
"Huh? Dad?" she asked, surprised.
What does she do now?
11312.title: Lisa

Bart walked in.
"Cool, my dad's shrunk!" he said to himself.
What does Bart do now?

1312.content:
Bart slowly sneak out of his room to make sure that no one was around and made his way into Lisa's room. As he entered the room, he couldn't believe how many things seem to out of place including his sister whom was still asleep in her bed.

"Lisa, Lisa!" said Bart as he shook her. "Huh wha..." was all Lisa said as she slowly woke up with her eyes closed. "Lisa..." said Bart but was cut off by Lisa when she said, "What do you want this early in the morning?" with her eyes still closed.

"Lisa...you may no believe this but something happened to me" said Bart as he took a few steps back. "Oh really Bart what is? You've grown a fifth finger on both hands and feet? Oh wait I know, you've turned green just like when you..." said Lisa as she sat up with her eyes opened to look at Bart.

Lisa just looked at him with her eyes wide and her mouth open as she couldn't make out what it is that she can see in front of her. "Bart...is that you?" asked Lisa as she went out of bed. "Yeah its me, only smaller..." answered Bart as he looked at his little sister walked up to see how tall she was to him.

To Bart's horror and to Lisa's delight, he was only tall enough to be under Lisa's shoulders. "So...what caused this to happen little brother?" asked Lisa with a smile on her face as she poked him. "Owch...I don't know....I just woke up like this" answered Bart as he looked at his foot and a half tall sister.

"Well, well, well, what should we do with you little brother, don't think I've forgotten what you did to me yesterday" said Lisa as she put her hands onto her hips. "Surly you can forget something like that huh?" asked Bart as he was abit scared at what she might to do to him. "Do you really think I would let this charce go?" said Lisa as she walked towards him as Bart walked backwads when he tripped.

On his back, Bart looked up at Lisa now looking taller than before, Lisa put her left hand on her chin and said with a teasing tone of voice, "So...what should little Bart do for his big sister?"
1312.title: Big Sister's Room

13121.content:
"Oh I know...for you to make up for what you did, you are to perform tasks till I say we're even" said Lisa as she looked down at Bart as he slowly made his way back to his feet. "Tasks...tasks, you're asking me, Bart Simpson to perform tasks for you? I don't think so" said Bart as he stood his ground not knowing that was his first mistake.

Lisa walked up to her little brother, pushing him onto the wall and said, "Now listen here little brother...from now on I'm the big sister and who knows if you ever go back to normal size, you may even get smaller for all I know. So trust me when I say this...its a good idea to be on my good books"

Bart looking up feeling scared at her height advancement decide to do the tasks that are to be asked of him. "Good...now then, get out of my room for me to get changed and...erm...if you can, change into something that might fit you, little brother" ordered Lisa as she pointed to the door. After Lisa changed into her normal clothes, she walked to Bart's room and what she saw made her laugh as nothing of Bart's things fit him as she saw him standing there with his normal clothes were too big for him. "Well...I guess I can't blame you for trying to follow my first order and I kinder saw this one coming so I brought something along that might be in you're taste" said Lisa as she threw a bag of clothes that match Bart's size.

Bart rushed to the bag and took out the clothes which to his surprise looked very much like the clothes he normally wear. Bart felt it would be best if he didn't ask as to why Lisa has such clothes and put them on. The clothes fit him perfectly.

"Come on little brother, lets go down stairs" ordered Lisa as she walked out of Bart's room with him following. The two of them walked downstairs and into the kitchen. They saw their mom, Marge busy making breakfast as their dad, Homer left to go to work. Lisa made her way to the table and looked at Bart to see what he was going to do...

As Marge let Bart go, she let him sit by the table and made the two of them breakfast. As they were finishing breakfast, Lisa looked at Bart as Marge walked off and said, "Well then little brother, what should we have you do?" Bart looked at his big sister with a worried look on his face. Lisa stood up and said “Let's go outside”

With that Lisa held onto Bart's small left hand and tugged him to follow. Bart hung his head as the two of them made their way to the back garden. As they were in the back garden, Lisa saw something that gave her a smile.

Lisa looked down at Bart whom was still trapped in her grasp and gave him a smile. “Come on little brother” said Lisa as she walked towards where she was smiling at. Bart looked forward and saw that it was a round table.

“Huh? What are we going to do out here?” asked Bart as he looked up at her all confused. “Why just sit here little brother, I will be right back” answered Lisa as she lifted Bart off the ground and placed him on the chair that was around the table.

Bart looked at Lisa as she walked back into the house. “Why is this happening?” asked Bart to himself as he noticed that his feet doesn't reach the ground. Just then, he heard Lisa coming back out with a cardboard box in hand.

13121121.content:
As Lisa reached the table, she placed the box down on its surface and took her hands in and took out, a set of china teacups along with fancy looking hats.

“Having a Tea party?” asked Bart as he looked at Lisa holding onto a black top hat. “Yep” answered Lisa as she put on a white ladies hat. She handed Bart the top hat, upon which placed the tea sets around the table.

Bart slowly put the top hat on and found it big on his head as it almost covered his whole forehead. Lisa looked at him and giggled at him. Just then, Bart suddenly grew blind. “Huh?” was all Bart said. Lisa looked at him and saw that the top hat covered his head whole.

Lisa leaned over and lifted the top hat off him. Bart looked up in horror to see an even bigger Lisa. “Wha...you've shrunk again?” asked Lisa as she was surprised at seeing her brother smaller again. Bart looked down and saw the clothes he was wearing still fit him.

“Come on then, lets see how tall you are now little brother” as she guested Bart to get off the chair. Bart jumped off and stood in front of Lisa. All Bart could see when looked ahead was orange, he slowly looked up and saw Lisa with a smile.

“Oh what are we going to do with you little brother?” said Lisa as she giggled as she put her hands onto her hips. Bart was only as tall as her waist, he was only two feet tall.

“Well then,” said Lisa as she took the top hat from Bart's hands, “Shall we begin” With that. Lisa put the hat on Bart's head. It swallowed his head completely as Bart found himself back in darkness once again.

1312112221.content:
"I am going to use you as my seat, Bart."

"What does that mean?"

"It means I am going to sit on you."

"Oh, right."

She forced the now-naked Bart into the nearest seat and asked him to remain still, which he did.

Lisa then immidately sat down in the exact same seat, directly on top of her older and now smaller brother.

"Nice and comfortable" Lisa smiled as she remained seated.

From his dominative size, Lisa felt much heavier than he remembered, and all of her weight was now focused entirely upon him.

Lisa smiled relaxed and allowed Bart to feel the full force of her presence upon him. She knew that with no free will that he would not even think of trying to budge her, although under the circumstances she didn't think he'd stand a chance of budging her anyway. Bart would have to remain under her butt for as long as she continued to sit on him, and she had only just sat down. She had no intention of moving any time soon.

Until she decided otherwise, Bart would simply have to serve as her personal slave-seat.

13511.content:
Lisa decides to have fun with Bart. She did all kinds of girly stuff with him like brush his hair, put make-up on him and have a tea party. Bart was so mad that he decided to get back at her. When Lisa wasn't looking, he crawled under the table and took both of her shoes off. After that, he started tickling her feet with his fingers. Lisa laughed. "Who's tickling me?" She asked herself. She then looked under the table but nothing was there. Bart crawled back up to his chair where he was. Lisa looked very suspicious at him. "Bart, who tickled me?" She asked him. "Nobody did." Bart said. "I felt something tickly on my feet." She said. "Ok, ok, I admit it, it was me." Bart said. Before he could say anything else, he ripped a big fart! "Bart! Eww!" Lisa shrieked, "Anyway, let's continue with our tea party." Before she could do anything, Bart farted again. "Eww Bart!" She yelled, "What is wrong with you?!" "I'm pretty gassy is all." Bart teased. After that, he farted some more. "Bart, you're doing that on purpose! Knock it off!" Lisa yelled. Bart didn't listen, as always, so he farted once more. Lisa was fed up that she put him in a diaper. "There, that'll keep you settled." She said. "Why'd you do that?!" Bart yelled. "In case if you poop your pants!" Lisa said. Then she burst out laughing. Bart was mad but he had no choice. It was a deal that Lisa was to have fun with him. 'It's only for right now, just until I grow back to my normal size.' He thought. Bart felt so hopeless. It felt like he would never get back to his regular size. He was so upset that he burped and farted at the same time. "Bart, you're disgusting!" Lisa shrieked. After that, she picked him up by his waist and laid him down on her table. She pinned him down with paper clips so he wouldn't get out. After that, she lifted up his shirt revealing his pudgy belly and took off his socks and shoes which revealed his cute feet. "What are you gonna do to me?" Bart asked. "Punish you of course." Lisa said. Bart was nervous about what Lisa was going to do to him. She grabbed a tiny feather and started tickling his armpits, sides, ribs and stomach! Bart laughed and laughed. He was extremely ticklish! "Are you going to stop ruining my fun?" Lisa teased. She then moved on to tickling his feet. Bart laughed louder now, his feet are very ticklish! After two hours of Lisa tickling Bart, Bart grew tired and said, "Ok, ok, I'll stop, I'll stop! Just stop tickling me! Ahahahahahahaha!" Instantly, Lisa stopped tickling him. It was now dark out so Bart passed out. Lisa picked him up and carried him to his bed.

What's going to happen the next day? Does Bart wake up the same size or is he back to his normal size?
13511.title: Lisa has fun with him!

135111.content:
The next day, Bart woke up back to his normal size. "Yippie! I'm back to normal! But that was weird..." Bart said. He then ran over to Lisa to tell her the good news. "That's great Bart, looks like you're cured." She said. Then Bart went off to start his normal day as usual. It turns out that an unknown predator spread shrinking potion all over his bed but then added the antidote that night since Bart learned his lesson after his torment with Lisa. Bart knew it all along but it turns out the unknown predator is, the one and only...Sideshow Bob!

Bum bum bum!!!

"Aaahh!!! Sideshow Bob!" Bart yelled, "Why did you spread shrinking potion all over my bed?!" "It was one of my planned evil schemes." Sideshow Bob said, "If it wasn't for you meddling kid! I would have gotten away with it!" And then he was arrested, which I flipped out on! I chased after the car on all fours like a rabid wild animal!

"Looks like my problem is solved." Bart said. Then he walked to school, humming, of course to start off his day.
135111.title: Bart wakes up back to his normal size!

145.content:
Professor John I.Q. Neidelbaum Frink, Jr.(Dr. Frink) mustered through his lab in the Springfield Heights Institute of Technology.
"This molecular submissive compacter will solve all of the current transportation woes. With the Breaking and honking and so on....." Frank said as he tightened the panel on the side of the 8 foot tall machine.
"Squeak squeak" a little mouse scurried across the floor and caught Franks attention.

Across town Lisa was writing in her diary about Todd. Maggie had come down with a temperature and, Homer being at the bar, Marge took Bart with her leaving Lisa in peace for the few hours it would take before they returned.

I never would have figured it but over these last few weeks I have really grown accustomed to Todd Flanders. Tonight we are going to watch a first screening of some Vegi movie while eating Salads . Ironic I know. *giggles*
Oh it is almost 8pm. I will let you know later...

Lisa opened the front door before locking it behind her and then looked up noticing the sun setting in the east. "The simple things"she thought sitting down justifying being a few minutes late.

Across town Dr. Frink aimed the molecular compacter at the mouse sitting next to the window. The sound of electronics churning began to fill the room before Dr. Frink fired reducing the mouse to mere centimeters.
Unknown to frank the beam that shrunk the mouse was considerably more powerful then first expected and only a portion had hit the mouse sending the remaining beam blazing across town.

Lisa let out a little sigh then got to her feet usually she would simply cut across the grass but she knew Mr. Flanders would notice so she walked along the street.
Suddenly the beam struck Lisa across the belly. Lisa was blinded temporally by the light.
"What the.." Lisa questioned rubbing her eyes then looked around.
" Ahhh I'm shrunk!" Lisa yelled looking around before hearing the hoot of a owl off in the distance.
"Well at least I am still on the sidewalk lisa said looking back at her house.
"I better..
